transcript_chunks.text: headset itself is great I think it's well made it's well designed but because we're kind of doing our review as the psvr to experience as a whole so I would have to put that at okay on our scale three out of five The Heavy Hitters that we were hoping would land um with things like call the mountain weren't quite at the caliber that I think I was hoping for from it despite having a really good time with a lot of elements of the headset there's a little bit lacking there I can't really in good faith tell people yeah run out and get this ASAP I think this very much is still for the hardcore I'm thinking four out of five because to her point I would say if someone had their heart set on this if this is your first experience coming into VR and the 550 price point isn't a barrier to entry for you I would pick it up I absolutely would have still bought this and I wouldn't wouldn't have regretted it at all the new games that are on the platform for me weren't hitting as much as I needed them

I would pick it up I absolutely would have still bought this and I wouldn't wouldn't have regretted it at all the new games that are on the platform for me weren't hitting as much as I needed them to for a brand new PlayStation VR2 headset that is 550 I think for me I also lean more towards a three out of five
